subject: RE: [junit] testing WebStart apps
msgSnippet: Mike, Long time no speak! ... Does the Junit FAQ have a list of suitable HTTP/HTML/Web testing tools that can be used from within Junit? Or, is the answer, it
messageBody:
Mike,

Long time no speak!

>That sounds like a personal choice.
>
>I find that some folks prefer HtmlUnit while others prefer HttpUnit.
>At the end of the day they both do basically the same thing.
>Therefore, my advice would be to pick the tool you're most productive
>using.

Does the Junit FAQ have a list of suitable HTTP/HTML/Web testing tools that can be used from within Junit? Or, is the answer, "it will have if you send me one"? :-)

>Mike

Simon
